trans-unit.source: Provides a design surface, which renders a visual representation of process flow.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en utformingsoverflaten som gjengir et bilde av denne arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowView is the design surface which renders a visual representation of process flow described in workflow markup.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowView er utformingsoverflaten som gjengir et bilde av denne arbeidsflyten som beskrives i arbeidsflyten markup.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowView offers a rich set of user interface functionality needed by the activity designers for rendering and for responding to various Windows-generated events.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowView tilbyr en lang rekke bruker grensesnittet funksjonaliteten som kreves av aktiviteten-utviklere for gjengivelse og for å svare på ulike Windows-genererte hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Also, the WorkflowView offers a set of common functions which can be used by all designers to perform certain activities.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowView tilbyr også et sett med vanlige funksjoner som kan brukes av alle utviklere kan utføre bestemte aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> with the specified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> med den angitte leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.IServiceProvider>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> is a component that handles messages from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>er en komponent som behandler meldinger fra <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: Using the `Strategy` design pattern, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> will pass messages to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den `Strategy` mønster for utforming av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>vil sende meldinger til den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>som skal behandles.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: Mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events are passed on to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Musen hendelser, tastaturhendelser paint og oppsettet hendelser som blir sendt videre til en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>tilknyttet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.target: Det øvre venstre hjørnet er 0,0; x og y koordinatene øke loddrett og vannrett i området kan vises.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samling installert med .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> references.
trans-unit.target: Når parameteren disposing er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>referanser.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om `Dispose` og `Finalize`, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Enables the button on the design surface that, when clicked, changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for utforming surface som når du klikker endringer zoomenivået for arbeidsflyten utformingen surface slik at hele arbeidsflyten som vises i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dynamic button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis knappen dynamiske er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref:System.Object> passed is visible, expanding parent objects and scrolling the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at den <xref:System.Object>sendt er synlig, utvide overordnede objekter og rulling av <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> etter behov.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use EnsureVisible when you are working with an object in the workflow that requires user interface cues.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EnsureVisible når du jobber med et objekt i en arbeidsflyt som krever at brukeren grensesnittet bunker.

trans-unit.source: EnsureVisible will expand parent objects and scroll the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> as necessary to make the object visible on the designer.
trans-unit.target: EnsureVisible utvides overordnede objekter og rulling av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>etter behov, slik at objektet synlige i utformeren.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å gjøre synlige.

trans-unit.source: selectableObject is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: selectableObjecter en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Endrer zoomenivået for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten slik at hele arbeidsflyten som vises i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The actual zoom level is dependent upon the settings of the user's workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Faktiske zoomenivået er avhengig av innstillingene for brukerens arbeidsflyten designer.

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level to one hundred percent to display the full size of the workflow in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Endrer zoomenivået på hundre prosent til å vise hele størrelsen på arbeidsflyten i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Henter serviceobjekt av den angitte typen hvis den er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: `GetService` returns a <xref:System.Object> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: `GetService`Returnerer en <xref:System.Object>implementere tjenesten, eller en nullreferanse (`Nothing`) Hvis tjenesten kan ikke løses.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på tjenesten som skal hente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If the serviceType is then returns a specific ; otherwise, returns a implementing the requested service, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den serviceType er deretter returnerer en bestemt ; ellers returnerer en implementere tjenesten, eller en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic) Hvis tjenesten kan ikke løses.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal scrollbar for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter det vannrette rullefeltet for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> du kan bruke til å justere innstillinger og vannrette rullefeltet synlighet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WorkflowView" name="WorkflowView" href=""></xref> finishes processing and is about to enter the idle state.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref uid="langword_csharp_WorkflowView" name="WorkflowView" href=""> </xref> er fullført, og er i ferd med å angi inaktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: If you have tasks to perform before the thread becomes idle, attach them to this event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har aktiviteter til å utføre før tråden blir inaktiv, må du knytte dem til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , og den tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon fra en binærstrøm.

trans-unit.source: LoadViewState restores view-state information previously saved by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState gjenopprettes visningsstatus informasjon om tidligere lagret ved å kalle den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you need to customize how a custom designer restores its view-state.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback occurs when a drag operation is started.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback oppstår når et dra-operasjonen er startet.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback gjør det mulig for kilden for en operasjon for dra for å endre utseendet av musepekeren for å gi visuelle tilbakemeldinger under en dra-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> er trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint occurs when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint oppstår når den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>tegnes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag option should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i løpet av en dra-operasjon, og gjør drakilden å finne ut om alternativet Dra bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnQueryContinueDrag-hendelsen oppstår når det er en endring i tilstanden tastaturet eller musen knappen under en dra-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryContinueDrag event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen OnQueryContinueDrag tillater drakilden å finne ut om dra operasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: Events related to drag operations are raised when the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Hendelser som er relatert til dra operasjoner registreres når kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the OnQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i tilstanden tastaturet eller musen-knappen, OnQueryContinueDrag hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for den `Action` for hendelsen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `DragAction.Continue`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon for musen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `DragAction.Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `DragAction.Cancel`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the OnQueryContinueDrag event sets `Action` to `DragAction.Cancel` if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to `DragAction.Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen OnQueryContinueDrag settes som standard `Action` til `DragAction.Cancel` Hvis du ESC trykket og angir `Action` til `DragAction.Drop` Hvis venstre midterste eller høyre museknappen trykkes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a different designer is set as the new root designer of the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en annen utformer er angitt som nye roten utformeren av utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Called when the zoom level is changed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når zoomenivået endres.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> å oppsettet logic alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: PerformLayout updates all child controls in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, resizing and moving them as necessary.
trans-unit.target: PerformLayout oppdaterer alle underordnede kontroller i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, endre størrelse på og flyttes etter behov.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cause the layout to update immediately; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kan forårsake oppsettet å oppdatere umiddelbart. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the PrintDocument object to set the properties that describe how to print, and call the `Print` method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PrintDocument-objektet til å angi egenskaper som beskriver hvordan du kan skrive ut, og kall av `Print` metode for å starte utskrift.

trans-unit.source: A PrintDocument object that sends output to a printer.
trans-unit.target: PrintDocument-objekt som sender utdata til en skriver.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print preview mode of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forhåndsvisningsmodus for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if print preview mode is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forhåndsvisningsmodus er aktiv. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes an associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en tilknyttet <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to respond to designer events, such as drag events.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>for å svare på designer hendelser, slik som dra hendelser.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> fjerne fra den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root designer for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den primære utformeren for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The root designer of the workflow is the designer associated with the design surface of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Root-designer av arbeidsflyten er utformingen tilknyttet utformingsoverflaten av arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: It contains all child designers, and subsequently all activities in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder alle underordnede utviklere og deretter alle aktiviteter i arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the root designer is changed.
trans-unit.target: Starter når designer roten er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Saves the view-state to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer visningsstatusen til en binær dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties and child controls of a view.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen er summen av verdiene i egenskapene og underordnede kontroller en visning.

trans-unit.source: Property values are persisted to the stream after saving and can be restored using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdier er beholdt i dataflyten etter lagring og kan gjenopprettes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to store the view state.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>brukes til å lagre visningsstatusen.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.target: Lagrer et bilde av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> til den angitte strømmen ved hjelp av det angitte bildeformatet.

trans-unit.target: streameller imageFormat inneholder et nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.target: Lagrer et bilde av WorkflowView til utklippstavlen.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> fra skjermen koordinatene til logisk koordinater.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>bruker to koordinaten mellomrom: logiske og: klienten koordinatene er i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: Det øvre venstre hjørnet er 0,0; x og y koordinatene øke loddrett og vannrett i området kan vises.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: Klienten koordinatsystemet påvirkes av zoomenivået for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>og av rullefeltet plasseringen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Alle objekter er i det logiske koordinatsystemet alltid tilordnet til 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen loddrett og vannrett påvirkes ikke etter zoom eller rullefeltet for plassering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> konvertere fra skjermen koordinatene til logisk koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> converted from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> konverteres fra skjermen koordinatene til logisk koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scrollbar on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen av rullefeltet på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ScrollPosition to get or adjust the location of the scrollbar in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av ScrollPosition til å hente eller justere plasseringen av rullefeltet i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A point describing the location of the scrollbar in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Et punkt som beskriver plasseringen av rullefeltet i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ShadowDepth for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ShadowDepth for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShadowDepth to get or adjust the shadow depth of text shown on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av ShadowDepth utføre eller Juster skyggen dybden på teksten som vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The shadow depth in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Skyggen dybden i piksler.

trans-unit.target: Viser den **Infotips** for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> med den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Viser den **Infotips** for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>med den angitte teksten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises på den **Infotips**.

trans-unit.source: infoTipText is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: infoTipTexter en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: Viser den **Infotips** for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> med den angitte tittelen og tekst.

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: Viser den **Infotips** for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>med den angitte tittelen og tekst.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The title of the **InfoTip** to display.
trans-unit.target: Tittelen på den **Infotips** skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The text of the **InfoTip** to display.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for det **Infotips** skal vises.

trans-unit.source: title is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or- infoTipText is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: - eller - infoTipText er en nullreferanse ().

trans-unit.source: Shows a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Viser en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""> </xref> på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: `ToolTips` are helpful notes to the user that display useful information about an object underneath the pointer.
trans-unit.target: `ToolTips`er nyttig merknader for brukeren som viser nyttig informasjon om et objekt under pekeren.

trans-unit.source: Use ShowInPlaceToolTip to display a `ToolTip` with the specified text and a desired location.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowInPlaceToolTip til å vise en `ToolTip` med den angitte teksten og ønsket plassering.

trans-unit.source: The text to display.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> specifying the location on the screen to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> å angi plasseringen på skjermen for å plassere den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Henter tjenesten for den angitte typen hvis den er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: If the `serviceType` is `CommandID` this method will return a specific `CommandID`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `serviceType` er `CommandID` denne metoden tilbakestiller en bestemt `CommandID`.

trans-unit.source: For any other `Type`, `GetService` will return an Object that implements the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre `Type`, `GetService` kommer til å returnere et objekt som implementerer tjenesten, eller en nullreferanse (`Nothing`) Hvis tjenesten kan ikke løses.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på tjenesten som skal hente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>implementere tjenesten, eller en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) Hvis tjenesten kan ikke løses.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Filters out a message before it is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Filtre er brukt av en melding før den er sendt.

trans-unit.source: The message to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal sendes.

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify this message.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre denne meldingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to filter the message and stop it from being dispatched; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the message to continue to the next filter or control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>filtrere meldingen for å hindre at som sendes; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å tillate meldingen for å fortsette til neste filter eller kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current ViewPortRectangle for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende ViewPortRectangle for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ViewPortRectangle contains the visible area of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: ViewPortRectangle inneholder området vises av arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area on the screen that is visible.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som beskriver området på skjermen som er synlig.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på synlige området for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på synlige for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Size" name="Size" href=""></xref> that describes the visible area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Size" name="Size" href=""> </xref> som beskriver området synlige i det <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scrollbar associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter loddrette rullefeltet knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use VScrollBar to get the vertical scrollbar on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, which you can use to make user interface adjustments.
trans-unit.target: Bruk VScrollBar til å få loddrette rullefeltet på den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, som du kan bruke til å justere for bruker-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> du kan bruke til å justere innstillinger og vannrette rullefeltet synlighet.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the WndProc method.
trans-unit.target: Alle meldinger som sendes til WndProc-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The WndProc method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: Metoden WndProc nøyaktig tilsvarer Windows `WindowProc` funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av Windows-meldinger i den `WindowProc` funksjonsdokumentasjon i Windows Platform SDK-referanse, finnes ikke i MSDN-biblioteket.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Message to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows-melding til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir zoom på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the zoom feature to enlarge or reduce the size of the components inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk zoom-funksjonen til å øke eller redusere størrelsen på komponentene i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> sets the minimum and maximum zoom levels for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>Angir minimum og maksimum zoom nivåer for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: The zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zoomenivået for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the zoom level is less than the minimum zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> -or- if the zoom level exceeds the maximum zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis zoomenivået er mindre enn minimum zoomenivå for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> - eller - hvis zoomenivået overskrider maksimum zoomenivå for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the zoom setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når zoominnstillingen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: The workflow view image is created as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten visningen bildet opprettet som punktgrafikk.
